sentence: They include Cawthorn and six other House members: Rep. Andy Biggs (R-Ariz.); Rep. Lauren Boebert (R-Colo.); Rep. Mo Brooks (R-Ala.); Rep. Louie Gohmert (R-Texas); Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.); and Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.).
author: Rick Henderson
title: The risky plan to prevent Congress' Jan. 6 sympathizers from running for re-election

sentence: Controversial Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) is taking a stand in a GOP primary two states to the east as Republicans battle each other in the 2022 midterms.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Paul Gosar endorses ‘dumbest guy in Congress’ in primary against Texas AG Ken Paxton

sentence: A big part of this play is that Kinzinger, along with neo-conservatives like Rep. Liz Cheney, are battling to regain control over a political party now inundated with more flagrantly corrupt, more flagrantly authoritarian, and more flagrantly incompetent officials like Sen. Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
title: Adam Kinzinger has a lot to say: Donald Trump ‘is the worst president the U.S. ever had’
